empty.title: It's all empty...
empty.desc: There's no content to be displayed.

tips.settings_sync: You can log in to save your settings online and sync with other devices..
tips.theme: You can change the application's color palette by going to %s > %s > %s > %s
tips.lang: You can change the application language by going to %s > %s > %s > %s

not_found.title: Configuration not found
not_found.desc: Sorry, we couldn't find the requested configuration.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.desc: Change the way the %s is displayed.

theme.title: Theme
theme.desc: Choose the color palette that will be used to present %s.

auto.name: Automatic theme
auto.example: Theme chosen based on your device configuration. Updates when enabling or disabling night mode.

light.name: Light theme
light.example: This is the light theme, great for places with high light.

dark.name: Dark theme
dark.example: This is the dark theme, great for low light locations and not straining your eyes.

amoled.name: AMOLED mode
amoled.example: This is AMOLED mode. On supported devices, this mode can help save battery life.

midnight.name: Midnight
midnight.example: The moon is above the clouds and falls below the clouds again.

custom_fonts.title: Custom fonts
custom_fonts.label: Permitir que o %s utilize fontes personalizadas

lang.title: Display language
lang.desc: Select the language you want the content to be displayed in.

empty_search.title: No results
empty_search.desc: We found no translations with the name entered. Make sure you typed it correctly and try again.

empty_files.title: Você ainda não tem traduções
empty_files.desc: Comece a traduzir pressionando "%s" para criar ou importar gravações.

request_permission.title: Permita-nos acessar a sua câmera.
request_permission.desc: Para que possamos fazer a leitura dos sinais, é necessário que você nos dê permissão para acessar sua câmera.
